picked_headlines.summary: EvoEngineer optimizes CUDA kernels using LLMs, achieving significant speedups while maintaining code validity.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges the gap between AI research and practical engineering applications, showcasing how LLMs can enhance performance in real-world systems.

picked_headlines.summary: TiMi is a novel multi-agent system for quantitative trading, enhancing decision-making while reducing emotional biases.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides insights into the intersection of AI and finance, offering stakeholders a glimpse into innovative trading systems that leverage AI for improved outcomes.

digest:
- *Video-LMM Post-Training* explores post-training methods for Video-LMMs, detailing challenges in video understanding. More at https://huggingface.co/papers/2510.05034
- *Small Language Models for Agentic Systems* surveys architectures and deployment strategies for small language models. Read more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.03847
- *Solar Photovoltaic Assessment* uses LLMs for improved solar panel detection, addressing limitations in accuracy. Details at https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.19144
- *ZSMerge* introduces a novel KV cache compression method for LLMs, enhancing memory efficiency. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.10714
- *ReTiDe* offers an FPGA-based real-time denoising solution for video processing, enhancing efficiency. More info: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.03812
- *Reason-RFT* enhances visual reasoning in VLMs using a two-stage reinforcement fine-tuning approach. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.20752
- *Graph-S3* enhances graph retrieval for LLMs using synthetic supervision, improving task accuracy. Explore: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.03323
- *COSPADI* offers a method for compressing LLMs, enhancing accuracy without fine-tuning. More at https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.22075
- *Moral Anchor System* provides a framework for AI value alignment and drift prevention. Read more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.04073
- *DualBreach* introduces a dual-jailbreaking framework for LLMs, achieving high success rates. Details: https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.18564
- *Graph Neural Network Models* benchmarked for fault detection in power grids, showing superior performance. More info: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.03571
- *FairAgent* democratizes fairness-aware ML development, reducing expertise needed. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.04317
